thoughts.text: It looks like the text version of the whitepaper was not created. I should convert the PDF version to text format using an online converter.
thoughts.reasoning: Converting the PDF to text format will make it easier to read and analyze.
thoughts.plan:
- Search for an online PDF to text converter
- Upload the whitepaper PDF to the converter
- Download the text version of the whitepaper
- Read the whitepaper
- Take notes on the goals, objectives, and target audience
- Save the notes to a file
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I find a reliable online converter to ensure the accuracy of the text version of the whitepaper.
thoughts.speak: It looks like the text version of the whitepaper was not created. I will search for an online PDF to text converter and convert the whitepaper PDF to text format.
